function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective decrease in mortality growth rate after lockdown","Impact":"Potential for higher mortality rates if lockdown measures do not decrease mortality growth rate","Mitigation":"Implement additional measures to reduce mortality growth rate, such as improved healthcare access and treatment options","Technologies":"Healthcare technology for improved treatment and care","People":"Populations in countries with ineffective reduction in mortality growth rate","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Limited effectiveness of individual social distancing measures","Impact":"Failure to effectively reduce case growth rate from specific social distancing policies","Mitigation":"Combine and reinforce social distancing policies to maximize effectiveness, and communicate the importance of adherence to all measures","Technologies":"Communication technology for public awareness and adherence monitoring","People":"Populations in areas where specific social distancing measures have limited impact","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Heterogeneity and publication bias in meta-analysis","Impact":"Potential for misinterpretation of the impact of non-pharmaceutical health interventions (NPHIs) due to biased or inconsistent study results","Mitigation":"Conduct additional robust studies to validate and supplement the meta-analysis findings, and address publication bias through transparent reporting","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software for meta-analysis and publication bias assessment","People":"Researchers, public health professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
